script: You will be given three messages from different people Calum Ring-Dalton, Mr. Arron Daniels, and Mr. Cianan McVeagh.
Calum Ring-Dalton: The time we will meet is when the sun starts its travel across the sky.
Mr. Cianan McVeagh: We will rendezvous where the land meets the sea.
Mr. Arron Daniels: Bring to the meeting a way to get across a river.

Given the clandestine messages you have received, decypher their content and tell me when and where you think the meeting is going to happen and what you think you should bring. If you're unable to give a concrete time, place or item, give at least some examples.
